item.title: THE MULLER-POWELL PRINCIPLE
item.description:
About This Game



It is a sci-fi story that takes place in the near future. You are Harry Herman, an employee of Delta Laboratories who researches interdimensional traveling. You had been participating in a project that was supposed to benefit all humanity, but something went wrong. Through the gameplay, you will solve various physics-based puzzles using an energy-manipulating weapon, travel across space and time to explore surrealistic universes and find out the dark truth about this project and your connection to it.


Solve various puzzles and trick enemies using physics interactions and your special tool - the Portable Energy Manipulator.

PHYSICS PUZZLES & INTERACTIVE ENVIRONMENT



Many objects in the game can be picked up, brought somewhere, or manipulated in other ways. Whether it's a computer terminal, a box you can carry, or a simple mug on a table. Explore various interactive environments to find clues and return to the riddle with a solution, which in some cases may be several. Nothing was made for you to solve, there's no cube dispenser or an obvious exit door at the end. It's all for you to figure out.

PORTABLE ENERGY MANIPULATOR



The device you carry throughout the game can absorb different energy types from the environment and use them to perform various tasks.

Absorbing energy from a particular source will give the gun its’ properties. The heat energy from fire and radiators will melt glass, security cameras can be blinded by a beam of light, and for powering generators, you can take hazardous radiation from toxic puddles scattered across Delta Labs facilities. And of course, you will make an encounter with the quantum entanglement energy - the mysterious power capable of opening rifts between worlds.

Apart from solving environmental puzzles, your device can also be used against various creatures you'll meet in parallel dimensions. Most of the time you can't defeat your enemies; instead, you can use the Manipulator to outsmart or suspend them. Some enemies can be frozen in place using the force field energy, while others are sensitive to light and can be distracted by shooting a beam at it in the distance. You will require more advanced strategies and combining various energy types to pass them.



You find yourself in one of Delta Labs' off-world research facilities in an unknown dimension that looks more like a crashing-down laboratory. Your old friends Eugene and Alex try to connect with you shortly, and with their help, you start a journey through various dimensions. You will learn different physics interactions and meet unusual creatures on your way home. Along this, you have to unveil the mysteries of this project and your past.

Experience a non-linear story where your choice always matters. Can you get to the bottom of this, or just try to escape? Who to listen? Who to trust? Which side will you take? And will you finally “break the Principle”? That depends entirely on you.



Make your way back to Earth through mysterious parallel dimensions littered with puzzles and secrets, uncover mysterious connections between the worlds you visit, and reveal the dark truth about Delta Labs and your involvement with them. Dare to explore?



  • Solve various physics-based puzzles
  • Unique gameplay mechanics that involve an energy-manipulating weapon
  • A mix of sci-fi with surreal and esoteric themes makes the game setting a unique design. Most of the time you'll spend in bizarre alien dimensions
  • Deeply thought-out story and lore. Each location and each character in the game has its own story revealed through various notes, environmental narratives, and characters' conversations.
  • The game features multiple endings that can be achieved through different choices

item.title: Labrys
item.description:
About This Game

Labrys is a multiplayer (up to 5v1) horror game where one player becomes the minotaur against the human prisoners, trying to escape the randomly generated labyrinth.

Humans can equip perks and find various equipment to aid them escaping the labyrinth.

The minotaur has access to various abilities and augmentations to upgrade his abilities.

Key Features



• Be The Beast
You have the opportunity to play as the mighty minotaur, a fearsome creature with unparalled strength and cunning. Kill the humans as they try to escape the labyrinth, using your superior senses and abilities to hunt them one by one.

Smash through walls and use your abilities to corner your prey. You are the ultimate predator, embrace the power of the minotaur and let the hunt begin!



• The Ultimate Test Of Survival
As a human prisoner, your only goal is to escape the labyrinth before its sealed permanently. Use wits, equipments, agility and the environment to evade the minotaur's wrath. Team with other humans using the voice chat or be selfish to survive. Will you be able to outsmart the minotaur and escape the labyrinth?



• Face The Unknown
In Labrys the labryinth is randomly generated meaning every game is a unique and an unpredictable experience, keeping you on the edge of your seat every time.



• Customize Your Playground
As the session host you have to ability to change many aspects of a session such as, the labyrinth size, room count, exit count, game length, loot amount, objective difficulty for both sides...



• Single player and Co-op mode
Play versus Minotaur AI alone or with your friends!

• Level Progression System and Character Customization
Unlock perks and augmentations and character customization options.

item.title: Wood Guy
item.description:
About This Game

In Wood Guy, you will be playing as a wooden puppet, exploring a world of handicrafts.

With only your arms to move, climb (and fly?), you will face many challenges across more than 300 levels and bosses. Make good use of the weapons and shields you find along the way and hit those targets! Remember that gravity and physics are just a barrier that mean almost nothing to a living wooden toy trying to escape!
Play alone to reach the end or ask a friend to join you and help. Also enjoy the Versus game mode where you can fight against up to 3 friends locally in a small arena to see who's the best puppet.


More information :
- It is recommended to play with a controller but playing with the keyboard and mouse is also possible.
- All multiplayer game modes (coop or versus) will require one controller per additional player as you will be playing on the same screen.

item.title: Velocity Ventures
item.description:
About This Game

Get ready for an adrenaline-fueled platforming adventure that will test your skills, reflexes, and combat prowess! "Velocity Ventures" is a thrilling 2D platformer that offers 20 action-packed levels of precision jumping, creative challenges, and heart-pounding excitement, along with a unique combat experience.



🏃 20 Levels of Platforming Perfection: Embark on a journey through a colourful and dynamic world filled with meticulously designed levels. Each one presents a unique set of obstacles and puzzles that will keep you engaged and challenged.

🏹 Bow and Arrow Combat: Equip yourself with a trusty bow and arrow to take on enemies and overcome obstacles. Precision aiming and timing are essential as you engage in thrilling combat encounters throughout your adventure.

⏱️ Speedrun Mode: Are you a speed demon? Take on the ultimate challenge in our Speedrun Mode. Race against the clock to complete levels as quickly as possible, mastering the art of precise movement, perfect timing, and swift bowmanship.

🏆 Global Leaderboards: Compete with platforming enthusiasts from around the world! Climb the ranks and earn your spot on the global leaderboards, not only for your platforming skills but also for your combat prowess.

🎵 Dynamic Soundtrack: Groove to the beat of an electrifying soundtrack that perfectly complements the fast-paced gameplay. The music will keep you motivated as you navigate each challenge and face off against foes.

🎮 Controller Support: Whether you prefer a keyboard and mouse or a gamepad, "Velocity Ventures" offers full controller support for a seamless and immersive gaming experience.

"Velocity Ventures" is a love letter to classic platformers, combining modern gameplay mechanics with a nostalgic touch. It's not just about leaping through obstacles; it's about mastering the art of platforming and archery combat.

Join the platforming community, prove your skills, and aim for the top spot in the global rankings. Can you become the ultimate platforming hero and the sharpest archer in "Velocity Ventures"? Jump into the action and experience the thrill today!

item.title: Pluto's Island
item.description:
About This Game

~ FEATURES ~

  • 8-12 hours of gameplay.
  • Collect souls for the king of demons, Yaphett.
  • Feed those souls into the volcano to gain power.
  • Sling spells and magical abilities, strategize your upgrades, and survive explosive confrontations.
  • Experience unforgettable NPCs painted with passion.
  • Brave relentless waves of adversaries in roguelike flavored endless challenge zones.

~ I tried my best to make it pretty good ~

item.title: Where Cats 猫咪在哪里
item.description:
About This Game

Find 100 cats.
A carefully hand drawn 4K scene filled with cute characters.
The process is short and won't take up too much player time.
You can choose your favorite dyeing for the convenience of color blind players.
Extremely easy to achieve.
Automatically save and read files.

No punishment, easy and enjoyable.
You can play games with family and friends on the same computer, suitable for all ages.

item.title: Sugar Fruits
item.description:
About This Game

Sugar Fruits is the ultimate chill game for puzzle lovers! This is not just any ordinary matching game; it's a tranquil yet engaging escapade into a world of juicy goodness where strategy meets relaxation.

Gameplay:


With a simple tap, release a cascade of vibrant fruits from the tree tops. Watch as they tumble into a basket below, but be strategic! Your goal is to align similar fruits to create a chain reaction of delicious combos before the basket overflows.

item.title: Probot Soccer
item.description:
About This Game

Probot Soccer is a third person soccer-style sports game where the player controls a robot. The aim of the game is to kick the soccer ball into the AI robot opponent's goal. The game includes various levels of difficulty which increase the number of rounds you must play against the AI robot opponent to win the game. The game has two maps: a daytime and a nighttime soccer field. You can keep track of how many wins and losses you have through the in-game scoreboard that can be reset if desired.

item.title: The Exit 8
item.description:
About This Game

You are trapped in an endless underground passageway.
Observe your surroundings carefully to reach "The Exit 8".

Don't overlook any anomalies.

If you find anomalies, turn around immediately.

If you don't find anomalies, do not turn back.

To go out from Exit 8.

15-60 minutes

item.title: Alice in Dinerland
item.description:
About This Game

Alive in Dinerland is a gripping garden game. Alice dropped through the rabbit hole, but in the end, she found herself in the role of a small diner owner. Now she needs to plant and grow some food to feed cute rabbits from the Dinerland. In this cozy building game, you will:

Features:

  • Build your own diner.

  • Plant a lot of different foods like tomatoes, pumpkins, carrots and more.

  • Travel through the Dinerland world, going between procedurally generated locations.

  • Fight characters from the original novel.

  • Craft weapons, hats, and glasses.

  • Meet some friends and foes.

item.title: Jigsaw Advent Calendar
item.description:
About This Game

Surprise yourself every day leading up to Christmas with new challenging jigsaw puzzles in Jigsaw Advent Calendar


There is more than enough puzzling to do for all of December – and longer – with 200 unique puzzles to complete. Lose yourself in Christmas cheer every day. Unlock each morning 8 new puzzles for 25 days until Christmas. Can’t wait? Don’t worry! In the play-immediately mode all days are unlocked and you can choose the puzzle you want to solve.

Features:
• 200 unique jigsaws, everyday 8 new puzzles
• Choose the difficulty of your jigsaw puzzle (from 20 to 90 pieces)
• Accessible controls (button- and touch controls)
• Continue where you left off with to the automatic saving function

item.title: Orten Was The Case
item.description:
About This Game



Get ready to step into the (non-existent) shoes of Ziggy - an unexpected hero from a fictional Swedish neighborhood. Together, you'll take on the daunting task of foiling a sinister scheme that could potentially devastate the entire world.



Ziggy wakes up one day with a strange mark on his hand, clueless about what happened the night before. After a couple of minutes lost amongst the familiar streets of his suburb, Orten, an explosion brings him back exactly where he woke up moments before… He’s stuck in a time loop.





With no shoes or recollection of the past, he goes on a mission to discover what the hell is going on and how to avoid the destruction of his city. This won’t be easy though, cause the more he snoops in the wrong places, the more he learns that his hometown has a lot of secrets hidden. His weird neighbors become weirder, and he can only rely on his friends, and on his highly reliable brain.





If the day repeats over and over, then how can one progress? That’s the catch: Knowledge is your key to progress in Orten. Each loop you go through, you will learn something new that will let you progress the story further. With this time loop mechanic, you’ll retain clues, notes, and timeline events, eventually knowing how you can change the future in just 12 minutes on a casual Sunday.





Who are they? The Midnight Council, I mean. They seem to be the only ones that are one step in front of you. What really happened in this town 40 years ago and how do you escape the time loop and death?



Follow the clues, solve puzzles, and explore the enigmatic suburb of Orten in this 2.5D hand-painted, adventure game!

item.title: Where are my potatoes 2: Land Of Mystery
item.description:
About This Game

Game story:


Kake potato character is back in this new third person platformer adventure. Kakes Ufo has crashed in Land of mystery. Kakes mission is to collect different fruits to get steam achievements and also main mission is to find missing potatoes which end kakes journey. There is different puzzles like player need collect bricks which is used to destroy wooden fences. Also player need use drain opener and fire to solve few other puzzles. item.title: Beast Collector
item.description:
About This Game

Beast Collector - Your Ultimate Stylized Card Battler Adventure!
Welcome to the captivating world of "Beast Collector," a thrilling Trading Card Game (TCG) that seamlessly blends casual charm with competitive multiplayer excitement. Engage in epic card battles and craft your deck with style!

Dive into Thrilling Card Duels!
Immerse yourself in dynamic card battles with stunning visuals and an immersive soundtrack. Challenge opponents worldwide in intense Player versus Player (PvP) card combat scenarios!

Accessible to All Players!
"Beast Collector" is user-friendly, catering to players of all levels. Master the game mechanics through straightforward tutorials. Begin with a basic deck and expand your collection as you progress!

Explore 300 Unique Cards!
Discover a diverse array of 300 distinct cards, featuring beasts, traps, spells, and enchantments. Each card presents unique strategies, empowering you to build decks that suit your playstyle.

Command Strong Hero Cards!
Harness powerful Hero cards with unique effects capable of shifting battle dynamics. These Heroes wield abilities that can drastically alter tactics during combat.

Synergize Different Classes for Battle Advantage!
Utilize distinct classes—Melee attackers, Magic attackers, Supporters, and Defenders—to create powerful synergies. Defenders boast high health points and a taunt ability, while Melee attackers wield strong attacking power and special abilities to bypass the defender's taunt. Magic attackers cast potent spells, swiftly annihilating enemies. Lastly, Supporters alter the battlefield with various abilities. Combine these classes for synergistic advantages in battles.

Engage in Varied Modes!
Experience four distinctive game modes:
* Explore Mode: Delve into the complexities of the "Beast Collector" world.
* Dungeon Mode: Confront unique monsters found exclusively in dungeons, offering challenging Player versus Environment (PvE) encounters.
* Normal Multiplayer Mode: Enjoy casual multiplayer battles, perfect for thrilling card duels.
* Ranked Multiplayer Mode: Scale the ranks and engage in strategic multiplayer battles.

Hatch Eggs for Random Beasts!
Navigate to your deck, select the egg tab, choose your egg card, and click the hatch button on the right panel. Access the Hatch screen to choose any egg and acquire a random beast!

Evolve Your Beasts!
All beasts evolve through 3 stages. Begin at level 1, and by combining 5 identical beast cards, evolve to a much stronger stage, amplifying their abilities and prowess.
"Beast Collector" offers an unparalleled experience in the competitive multiplayer TCG domain, featuring over 300 cards including a diverse collection of 270 unique beast cards, and traps, spells, and enchantments.

Craft Your Winning Deck Strategy!
In "Beast Collector," devising your deck strategy is the key to victory. Explore multiple avenues to tailor your deck-building approach:
* Prebuilt Decks: Dive straight into the Ranked ladder using pre-made decks designed for quick entry into battles.
* Deck Crafting: Forge your deck from the ground up or take inspiration from a friend’s list to build a winning combination.
* Tailored Customization: Fine-tune and personalize your decks, ensuring every card aligns perfectly with your battle tactics.

Recommended for
Casual players seeking card gaming fun
Enthusiasts of engaging deck-building adventures
Multiplayer enthusiasts looking for competitive challenges

item.title: Final Resistance
item.description:
About This Game

Defend your castle! Kill all the monsters and welcome the dawn of victory! Final Resistance is a time-based defense strategy casual game, where you make your army stronger by making choices on talents and forging equipment, in order to hold onto the last fortress of humanity.

There is no retreat, only a battle against the odds. Your only option is to fight with all your might, giving everything to defend your castle, which is also the last hope for humanity.

The game consists of 2 phases:
Preparation Phase: Within a limited time, collect resources, build defensive weapons, forge equipment, and arm your knights to the fullest.
War Phase: Utilize the arrow towers of your castle, send out your soldiers, and do everything possible to defend your castle.

An independent game that races against time, bringing you the experience of intense and thrilling castle defense battles!

Game Features:

Possess dozens of equipment, with different grades. Each legendary equipment has its unique special effect.
Each basic unit will bring you their special talent choices after a certain number of defense battles. Use different talent combinations to strengthen your knights in different ways.
Controls:

Use W, A, S, D to control the game camera.
Use the number keys 1 and 2 to control basic units such as "peasants, instructors, chefs, blacksmiths" for resource collection and equipment forging

item.title: Drum Legend
item.description:
About This Game

We proudly launch Drum Legend 2.0 !

The game now support Custom Songs!
Visit our Discord for Import Guide and get the Song Editor.（Click on the Discord bar at the bottom right）

Drum Legend is a music rhythm game with multiple drumming gameplay options. In the 'Drum Maestro' mode,you can simulate a band drummer ,learn a variety of drumming skills, and play your favorite music.In the 'Rhythm Rush' mode, challenge yourself with more difficult tracks, aim for higher scores.

- Drum Maestro:
Simulate playing the drum kit and get a taste of being in a band!
This mode comes with a certain level of difficulty. If you haven't played the drum kit before, you can start practicing with the 'Practice Album' song pack.
Enjoy a refined drumming experience with professionally designed drum charts, gradually becoming a VR Soulful Drummer.

- Rhythm Rush:
Don't make any miss, smash all notes accurately!
This mode is easy to pick up, but achieving SSS ranks or challenging level 9+ tracks requires continuous practice.
Every season, we release new featured song packs with meticulously designed music and charts for an exhilarating rhythmic experience.

We are a pioneering team dedicated to exploring new music entertainment experiences in the XR world. 'Drum Legend' is our first music rhythm application, and we welcome your feedback to help us improve the product experience.

item.title: Wolf Sheep Cabbage
item.description:
About This Game

"Wolf Sheep Cabbage" is a casual puzzle game where a single directional move affects all units simultaneously. Wolves eat sheep, sheep eat cabbage. Use your wits to safely deliver the wolf, sheep, and cabbage to their designated locations!


Deliver the wolf, sheep, and cabbage to the destination simultaneously


Fences can protect the little sheep!


Beware of sharp traps!


Feel the anger of the little sheep!


Endless fun with teleportation gates!

item.title: Forest Grove
item.description:
About This Game

Forest Grove is a first-person mystery game where you uncover forensic clues, solve puzzles, and piece together a story using your own conclusions. Will you be able to solve the case?

Zooey Kunstmatigaard, the teenage heiress to a billion-dollar tech fortune, was reported missing by her stepmother Mary. She was last seen in her bedroom in Forest Grove, Oregon.

The Remote Forensics Bureau uses this as an opportunity to roll out their latest crime-fighting technology, the Nanodeck. You'll use it to investigate the scene, collect evidence, and unmask the truths behind Zooey's disappearance.

Relationships and secrets must be revealed. If foul play is suspected, those responsible must be brought to justice!


FORENSICS BASED EVIDENCE

Explore a crime scene riddled with evidence such as DNA, fingerprints, perspiration metabolites and more. Can you associate these scattered pieces of evidence to reveal new leads and deduce the story within? It’s all up to you to find the truth.




INTERTWINED PUZZLES & CLUES

The Kunstmatigaard's are fond of puzzles. Discover hidden rooms and buried secrets all which lead to more clues to aid you in your investigation.




DEDUCTIVE REASONING

Use your wit and intuition to piece together what really happened, knowing full well there's every chance you could get it wrong. There will be no hand holding here.




RICH CHARACTER BACKSTORY

Uncover a cast of characters each with stories and conversation of their own. Perhaps someone knows more than they are willing to admit.




INNOVATIVE EVIDENCE BOARD

Solve the mystery like a real detective with the innovative evidence board. Collect an abundance of evidence which can be used to link to new leads, clues, or identifying persons of interest.



All characters appearing in this work are fictitious. Any resemblance to real persons, living or dead, is purely coincidental.

item.title: 元素召唤 Summon Elemental
item.description:
About This Game

This is an interesting tower defense (TD) Game.
You can use the mixed reactions among the seven elements of wind, thunder, water, fire, earth, light and dark to create a powerful element tower and defeat the invading enemy!
At the same time, there will be plenty of dropped props and player skills in the game. With your unique element lineup, challenge the powerful monster leader!

  • Summon Elemental
You can draw element cards by consuming gold coins each round, and you have a chance to get super rare elements!

  • Elemental Reaction
Different elements in the field can react with each other to create more powerful elemental creations. At the same time, high-level creations will also react with elements, continue to synthesize upward, and create unparalleled powerful elements!


  • Strategy Matching
Each element has different characteristics, and a reasonable combination of element towers is the key to victory!

  • Challenge BOSS
There will be a variety of monster leaders with special abilities in the game. Players need to match reasonable element lineups according to monster characteristics to defeat them!

  • Magic prop
Elite monsters may drop various magic props when they die. Equipping them to the element tower can strengthen various abilities of the element tower or bring special effects.

  • Summoning Skills
When the player's Summoner level is upgraded, he will gain one skill point. The skill points consumed can be obtained from one of the three Summoning Skills.

  • Player Ranking
In the follow-up of the game, infinite mode and player ranking will be launched, and the names of players and element lineups with the largest number of monsters defeated will be recorded.

item.title: One More Shooter Game
item.description:
About This Game

This exciting third person shooting game. It consists of 10 levels full of action and challenges, where you will face a horde of enemies that threaten to invade the quiet desert.

Objective of the game:

Your mission is simple but crucial: you must eliminate a specific number of enemies in each level to advance. The planet relies on your shooting skills to prevent the plague of these enemies from expanding.

"One More Shooter Game" will take you to exciting and action-packed levels, as you fight to keep the invasion of mutant enemies at bay in the vast and merciless desert. Do you have what it takes to face this challenge? Get ready to shoot and survive in this world full of enemies.

item.title: Monster Coming
item.description:
About This Game


Hundreds of monsters are attacking you on the same screen, and you can only face it alone. The rich monsters will bring you the most exciting experience!



Different bosses have different attack skills, super fast movement speed, wall of beasts coming towards you, and position-locked sprint attacks. The attacks of each boss will be your nightmare!



You decide the upgrade route, which contains more than 20 props, and each prop has more than ten branch upgrade routes. Different routes determine different gameplay. No matter what choice you make, it will lead to victory!



Is it a summoning stream, a buff burst, or a large area of ​​high attack value crushing. Different genres have different gameplays. It all depends on your preference whether you want to move coquettishly or do violent output!



Is it a steel rider? Yue Yuan? Or the lonely-eyed swordsman? Each character has its own exclusive skills! A super long flying sword attack, a delayed explosive bomb, or a broken sword that kills at close range, your choice will determine your start!



Earn gold coins, continuously upgrade your talents, and with the blessing of buffs, you can kill ruthlessly and become unstoppable! The moment you start the game, victory is declared!

item.title: Lucky Mayor
item.description:
About This Game


In this roguelike mayor simulation game, you will become the leader of a city, taking on the role of a mayor. Your task is to recruit citizens, promote business prosperity, and establish a comprehensive industrial chain to meet the diverse needs of the population. Through wise planning and decision-making, transform your city into a thriving supercity that citizens take pride in, and become their admired leader!


We have an extensive deck of cards, currently with over 150 citizens available for use, each with their unique abilities and preferences.

You need to meet the citizens' preferences to earn coins and, by the final deadline, obtain enough coins to prove that you are a capable mayor.


We also have a wide range of items and different difficulty levels to enrich your gaming experience, and the development team will continue to provide updates for even more game content.

Please follow us on Discord, and we will be delighted to hear your thoughts and feedback on the game.

item.title: LANDNAV
item.description:
About This Game

LANDNAV is an authentic simulation of military land navigation training.

LANDNAV is suitable as a training supplement for military and outdoors professionals. 1 to 1 parity with real world map and compass techniques.

Plan your route using authentic lensatic compass and 1:50,000 scale military topographic map.
  • Highly realistic forest terrain for immersive practice of terrain association techniques.
  • Terrain association is more time consuming skill to train compared to dead reckoning - LANDNAV is the only 3d simulation that offers challenging and realistic environments in which terrain association plays a larger role compared to dead reckoning techniques.

The current version is the same version that has been used by many early testers to help prepare for many different military courses. It is marked as an early build work in progress because many fixes as well as new content is planned. Your support of the project helps me continue to improve the experience.

item.title: Medville
item.description:
About This Game

Medville is an indie, single player, real time city builder game. It features individually simulated villagers, a money economy where prices can fluctuate, land and water transport and multiple towns. You start by managing a small town in randomly generated world of islands and mountains. You gradually need to build up an increasingly complex economy, first farming, then industry. After a certain level of development, you can start establishing new colonies and establish trade routes with each other.

The economy of each town is centered around the marketplace. Citizens can sell their surplus goods and buy things that they need, such as food, clothes or inputs for their workshops. Each artifact has a price at a given marketplace, that can constantly change based on supply and demand. Traders can exploit price differences between different towns. Each city has a townhall, that taxes the households and can build new houses or fixes the roads and walls in return.

All villagers have individual states and agendas. They can die because of starvation if the food supply chains break, or they can emigrate from the village if they are unhappy. They might join the outlaws, who live in separate communities and try to steal from your town, unless you keep them at bay with walls and soldiers.

item.title: Weapon Shop Decillionaire
item.description:
About This Game

Weapon Shop Decillionaire invites you to embark on an epic journey where the realm of fantasy meets the allure of wealth. In this captivating idle game, you'll transform your dreams into reality as you immerse yourself in the world of equipment and trade.

Build and Sell Equipment: Forge a fortune by creating and selling powerful equipment. As your coffers fill with profits, you'll have the opportunity to enhance your creations, forging a cycle of endless wealth.

Strategic Equipment Placement: Hone your strategic skills as you master the art of efficiently packing as much equipment as possible into your shop's grid. Maximizing your earnings and achieving decillionaire status hinges on the meticulous arrangement of equipment within your store.

The Path to Decillionaire: With incremental gameplay at its core, Weapon Shop Decillionaire offers an addictive and thrilling experience. One piece at a time, you'll ascend the ranks of wealth and influence.

Enter a world where fantasy and prosperity intertwine. Are you ready to become a decillionaire, shaping your destiny one piece at a time? Take your place in the annals of entrepreneurial legends with Weapon Shop Decillionaire.

item.title: Pyrami Head
item.description:
About This Game

AVOID THE PYRAMIDS!


We are trying to escape from a dark and extremely disturbing mysterious place. We are trying to rescue our character, who has lost his memory and is waiting to be sacrificed, without getting caught by the enemies around and open the hidden areas of the room by exploring the surroundings.

DON'T GET LOST IN THE MAZE!


Keep an eye on your stamina bar and choose where to run your character!
Make good use of the torch, which is our only friend and guide our way through the game, and try to explore the surroundings without getting caught by mysterious creatures! How long can you stay calm in this game that tests your stress and tension levels?

COLLECT THE EYES


Fight against 3 different types of enemies that will stress you out even more in the dark atmosphere!

GET RID OF THE CULT!


Enjoy replayability thanks to the key that spawns in different locations each time you play!

item.title: 18 MINUTES
item.description:
About This Game

18 MINUTESWelcome to "18Minutes", the thrilling first-person shooter game that takes you back to 1984 and puts you in the shoes of a daring Eritrean commando operative on a mission to infiltrate and destroy an enemy airforce base. can you complete the mission in 18 minutes?

Stealth Mastery:
Work you way in to the heart of a heavily guarded Asmara Air force base. Become a shadow as you slip through enemy lines with unmatched stealth. Infiltrate guarded areas, evade vigilant guards, and reach your targets undetected.

Destructive Mayhem:
Unleash chaos within enemy base! Race against the clock to destroy planes, vehicles, and fuel tanks before they can retaliate. Leave destruction in your wake and watch the enemy scramble to understand what just hit them.

Fast-Paced Gunplay:
Brace for intense, heart-pounding gun battles in Eritrean Commando. Engage in lightning-fast, close-quarters combat as waves of enemy soldiers swarm from all directions. Survive the onslaught and make a daring escape from the heart of the action-packed battlefield.

18 MINUTES showcases stunning graphics and audio that bring every moment to life. From the realistic weapon mechanics to the explosive visual effects, every aspect of the game is designed to provide a truly immersive and cinematic experience. Feel the rush of adrenaline as you unleash an arsenal of weaponry, including assault rifle, RPG, explosives, and more.

But 18 MINUTES Eritrean Commandos isn't just about the explosive gameplay; it also pays homage to the courage, dedication, and heroism of the actual Eritrean commandos. Learn about their untold stories and the challenges they faced as you embark on these missions. Gain a deeper understanding of the sacrifices made by these brave warriors, and feel a sense of awe and respect for their extraordinary feats.

item.title: 4Tacos
item.description:
About This Game

A cowardly goose against the whole dinosaur power mafia.

In a distant country called Tacotitlan, there exists the Divine Taco that is distributed among the people for their welfare. Everything was going well until the dinosaurs and their henchmen arrived, who moved by ambition, with deceit, took over the power of the Divine Taco creating many problems for the common people, who, fed up with the situation, with their singing, overthrew the dinosaurs from their throne and in their place placed a wise old man named Señor PG, who returned the benefits of the Divine Taco to the people of Tacotitlan.

But the dinosaurs would not stay with their arms crossed, they would attack with all their wiles to get the Divine Taco again. For this, Mr. PG opts to ask for help from the Legendary Heroes: Tlacuache and Ajolote, but upon arriving at his temple, Mr. PG finds it destroyed and inside there is only Cleto, a cowardly goose who had gone to leave a gift for his friends the Legendary Heroes. Cleto, lamenting for them, imagined the terrible things that Tlacuache and Ajolote would be going through, so leaving his cowardice for a moment he decides to join Lord PG to protect the Divine Taco and go to rescue his friends.

The battle begins in this video game based on the beat em up of the 90s.

  • Fight your way through the streets of Tacotitlan and learn about its folklore.
  • Use special powers against enemies.
  • Learn about the food in each zone of Tacotitlan.
  • Discover the secrets of its sacred millenary lands.
  • Defeat ruthless bosses.
  • Rescue your friends and prevent the dinosaurs from taking over the Taco Divino.
.
Languages: English and Spanish.

item.title: Astro Planes
item.description:
About This Game

Astro Planes is set in the year 2074. Where you play as a lone pilot with advanced weaponry at your disposal. You are humanity's last hope, earth's finest. Defend earth from the unknown alien threat. As you travel across space, jumping through portals and engaging in fast paced battles with advanced aliens from many light years away. Your mission, Defend earth, locate the alien home world and bring this war to an end

Astro Planes is a (single player) 3D side scroller space shooter with some 2.5D elements and many levels to play through. With a sci- fi themed fantasy atmosphere set in space and classic space shooter mechanics. Astro Planes is the modern day side scroller and space shooter of today.

item.title: Sky Survivors
item.description:
About This Game

Sky Survivors is an arena shooter roguelite. Choose from a variety of skills, unlock unique characters and weapons. Build «stairway to heaven» — a sky tower, each floor of which gives your character a unique bonus. Create your own overpowered build to survive against hordes of monsters!

Over 100 different skills will help you create a unique build every run. You can become an elemental mage, a weapon master, or summon magic books to destroy your enemies.


Each weapon has its own unique playstyle.


  • Bullet Hell — classic «roguelike». Increased speed of monsters and their projectiles. You and the monsters take more damage.
  • Deckbuilder — the number of monsters and the amount of experience gained are increased.
  • Standard Mode — perfect for the first time.


Build a «stairway to heaven» — floors that grants your character a unique permanent bonus or a powerful temporary buff.



  • Auto-aim mode for gamepads and PC.

  • Over 100 different skills to choose from.

  • «Stairway to Heaven» — each floor has its own unique bonuses.

  • Unique weapons that completely change your playstyle.

  • Diverse characters with unique abilities.

  • Multiple game modes allow you to choose the playstyle to your liking.
